message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?

I understand that $180 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?

I understand that you're still a bit hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $155. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $152. This is the best I can do. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
